original: Asplund, Per Harald, civilingenjör, Halmstad, f. 17/4/08 i Gbg av övdöjtn. Arthur A. o. Ester Nordensson. G. 38 m. Anna Svenselius. Barn: Harald f. 42. — Stud :ex. i Gbg 26, ord. stud. v. KTH 27-31, avg:ex. (V) 31. Konsult. ing. i Gbg 31-34, anst. å väg- o. vattenbyggn :styr. vägbyrå 34, konsult, ing. 34-35, e. väging :assist. i Hall. 1. 35-38, väging :assist. i Örebro 1. 38-39, tf. bitr. väging. i Örebro 1. 39-41, bitr. väging. i Jönköp. 1. 41-43, väging. i Jön-köp. 1. 44-45, väging. i Hall. 1. sed. 46.
translated: Asplund, Per Harald, engineer, from Halmstad. Born on April 17th, 1908 in Gothenburg to Lieutenant Arthur A. and Ester Nordensson. Married to Anna Svenselius in 1938, with one child, Harald, born in 1942. Per Harald passed his student examination in Gothenburg in 1926 and continued his studies at the Royal Institute of Technology from 1927 to 1931, when he graduated (with honors in the spring). He worked as a consulting engineer in Gothenburg from 1931 to 1934, and then was employed by the Board of Public Works and Water Management for road construction projects. From 1935 to 1938 he worked as a road construction assistant inspector in Halmstad, and from 1938 to 1939 as the interim assistant inspector in Örebro. He then worked as an assistant inspector in Jönköping from 1941 to 1943, and as an inspector in Jönköping from 1944 to 1945, before returning to Halmstad as an inspector in 1946.

worksFor.name: Board of Public Works and Water Management
